newsitem.title: USA: Pioneer Hi-Bred sees FY97 EPS $2.70 to $3.10.
newsitem.headline: Pioneer Hi-Bred sees FY97 EPS $2.70 to $3.10.

text.p: Pioneer Hi-Bred International Inc said Tuesday that it expects earnings for fiscal year 1997 to be in a range of $2.70 to $3.10 per share, but added that factors such as pricing, seed costs and corn acreage could still affect results.
In a release Tuesday the company said that while there are still many uncertainties that could cause changes in earnings projections, fiscal 1997 is "shaping up to be another strong one."
The First Call analysts' consensus estimate for fiscal 1997 is $3.02 per share.
Pioneer earned $2.68 per share for fiscal 1996.
